title: ETH staking entry queue surges to two-year high as institutions accumulate
summary: Institutional demand for Ethereum staking is soaring, leading to a record-high entry queue. Confidence in the blockchain is also growing. Meanwhile, the exit qu

body.raw:
![ ETH staking entry queue surges to two-year high as institutions accumulate ](https://images.cointelegraph.com/images/528_aHR0cHM6Ly9zMy5jb2ludGVsZWdyYXBoLmNvbS91cGxvYWRzLzIwMjUtMDIvMDE5NGMxZjgtZDYxZS03NWNlLWIxODMtZWQ4NjY4MGRmNWRl.jpg)

Institutional demand for Ethereum staking is soaring, leading to a record-high entry queue. Confidence in the blockchain is also growing. Meanwhile, the exit queue is on the decline. Exciting times for ETH enthusiasts!

---

**Original Article:** [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-staking-entry-queue-hits-highest-level-for-2-years?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound)

*This article was originally published on [Cointelegraph.com News](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-staking-entry-queue-hits-highest-level-for-2-years?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound) and has been curated for our readers.*
